alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Merrick; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 10:47PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern York, northeastern Hamilton, central Merrick and Polk Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1047 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Central City to Stromsburg to near Rising City. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... York, Central City, Stromsburg, Osceola, Shelby, Hampton, Clarks, Polk, Bradshaw, Waco, Benedict, Marquette, Gresham, Hordville and Thayer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
